attributes.action: Force NHS Ambulance Trusts to CRB all existing staff
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems that NHS Ambulance Services throughout the UK only CRB new staff, leaving all existing old staff un-checked. How can the NHS justify the negligence towards the public when Ambulance staff have access to vulnerable persons / children without full enhanced checks. My Service do not CRB existing staff due to budgets !
